item.description:
John Harvard's boasts an extensive list of brews, ranging from the tried and true All American Light Lager to the rich, roasted Dry Irish Stout.

They have a yummy and reasonable menu and it looks like a lot of fun.

Meet Susan and I over at the bar - it'll be self-seat. Ask the host for the Meetup Group and they can send you our way! Cheers.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Sox hat and possibly a Sox shirt. I will be mingling at the bar and possibly getting a table later on, depending on how many people are coming-Susan
item.why: John Harvard's Pale Ale, All American Light Lager, Nut Brown Ale, Dry Irish Stout, Old Willy India Pale Ale...
item.name: Drinks at John Harvard's Brew House
